base-errors-partup_could_not_be_inserted: Oh bummer, we could not create your part-up. Please try again.

base-errors-partup_could_not_be_removed: Sorry, we couldn't remove the part-up.
base-errors-email_is_already_invited_to_: This e-mail is already invited to this part-up.
base-errors-user_could_not_be_marked_as_: Oh bummer, we could not make you supporter. Please try again.
base-errors-user_could_not_be_unmarked_a: Oh bummer, we could not remove you as a supporter. Please try again.

base-errors-users_could_not_be_autocompl: We could not lookup the uppers.
base-errors-tags_could_not_be_autocomple: We could not autocomplete the tags.
base-errors-comment_is_not_allowed_on_a_: Nice try, but you are now allowed to comment on a system update.
base-errors-comment_could_not_be_inserte: Oh bummer, we could not add your comment. Please try again.

base-errors-user_is_already_member_of_ne: This upper is already a member of this tribe.

base-errors-user_could_not_join_network: Sorry, something went wrong while joining this tribe.
base-errors-user_could_not_leave_network: Sorry, we couldn't end your tribe membership.
base-errors-user_could_not_be_removed_fr: We couldn't end the the tribe membership for this upper.
base-errors-user_could_not_be_accepted_f: Sorry we could not make this upper a member of the tribe.
base-errors-user_could_not_be_rejected_f: The upper could not be rejected from the tribe.
base-errors-email_is_already_invited_to_: This email address is already invited to this tribe.
base-errors-activity_could_not_be_insert: Oh bummer, we could not create your activity. Please try again.

base-errors-activity_could_not_be_unarch: Sorry, we couldn't unarchive the activity.
base-errors-activity_could_not_be_found: Sorry, we couldn't find the activity.
base-errors-activities_could_not_be_copi: Sorry, we couldn't copy the activities from the part-up.
base-errors-user_is_already_invited_to_a: This upper is already invited for this activity.
base-errors-email_is_already_invited_to_: This email address is already used to invite someone for this activity.
